Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: BICC Base KM COMPONENT VERSION: 1 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: ODI 12.2.1.4.0 or above
DESCRIPTION This KM provides some common options and methods used by the other ADW integration KMs.
If set to True ODI will submit a BICC extraction job for the source datastore.
If set to False ODI will reuse existing credentail.

BEGIN dbms_cloud.create_credential( credential_name => '$[credName]', <? if (odiRef.getDataServerInfo( "BICC_OBJECT_STORAGE_IS_DATA_SERVER", "$[biccLSchemaName]") == "TRUE") {?> username => '$[objStoreUser]', password => '$[swiftPwd]' <?} else {?> username => '$[csUser]', password => '$[csPwd]' <?}?> ); END;
Find extract files on BICC storage
endPoint = "${biccEndPoint}/bi/ess/esswebservice" comressionType = "gzip" username = "${biccUsername}" pass = "${biccPassword}" jobDescription = "ODI ESS Job"
